lines.text: n , m , a , b num = long long with num having value of 0
lines.code: long long n , m , a , b , num = 0 ;

lines.text: read n , m , a and b
else if n is less than m
set num to the minimum of ( a * ( m - n ) ) and n * b
lines.code: num = min ( a * ( m - n ) , n * b ) ;

lines.text: y , z = long long with y value of n mod m and z value of m minus n mod m
lines.code: long long y = n % m , z = m - n % m ;

lines.text: set num to the minimum of y * b and z * a
lines.code: num = min ( y * b , z * a ) ;
